```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#Load needed Libraries
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

#Load in Bike data
bike <- read_csv("BicycleData.DAT")
```

```{r}
##Table 1##

##NEED TO DO US and NON US#

#Cycling Distance
Cycle_dist <- bike %>% group_by(CycleDist2) %>% count() %>% mutate(Percent = round((n / dim(bike)[1])*100, digits=2)) %>% rename("Cycle Distance" = CycleDist2) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate("Weekly Cycling Distance" = c("<16 km (10mi)", ">16km")) %>%select("Weekly Cycling Distance", n, Percent)

#Education
Education <- bike %>% group_by(Education) %>% count() %>% mutate(Percent = round((n / dim(bike)[1])*100, digits=2))

#Traffic control device
Traffic_cntrl_device <- bike %>% group_by(Treatment) %>% count() %>% mutate(Percent = round((n / dim(bike)[1])*100, digits=2)) %>%ungroup() %>% select(n, Percent) %>% mutate("Traffic Control Device" = c("None", "Share the Road", "Shared Lane Marking", "Bicycle May Use Full Lane")) %>%select("Traffic Control Device", n, Percent)

#Commute Mode
Commute_mode <- bike %>% group_by(CommuteType2) %>% count() %>% mutate(Percent = round((n / dim(bike)[1])*100, digits=2)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate("Commute Mode" = c("Private Motor Vehicle", "Other Means")) %>% select("Commute Mode", n, Percent)

#Gender
Gender <- bike %>% group_by(Gender) %>% count() %>% mutate(Percent = round((n / dim(bike)[1])*100, digits=2)) %>%ungroup() %>% mutate(Gender = c("Female", "Male", "No response")) %>% select(Gender, n, Percent)


#Print out tables to look nice
##knitr :: kable(Traffic_cntrl_device)

 


```
